explains: n. 重考；重新摄录；重新摄录的照片或录音

sentences.en: Government forces moved in to retake the city.
sentences.cn: 政府军开进城市，以恢复对它的控制。

sentences.en: Officers were going to retake sectors of the city.
sentences.cn: 军官们打算收回该市的一些军事管制区。

sentences.en: Moore fought back to retake the lead later in the race.
sentences.cn: 后来穆尔奋力反击，重新夺回了比赛中的领先地位。
